Package net.jandie1505.playerlevels.core.rewards.types

Klasse LuckPermsPermissionReward

java.lang.Object
net.jandie1505.playerlevels.core.rewards.types.LuckPermsPermissionReward
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
RewardCondition, RewardDescriptionProvider, RewardExecutor
public class LuckPermsPermissionReward extends Object implements RewardExecutor, RewardCondition, RewardDescriptionProvider
A reward that gives a permission to a player when it is applied.
It also checks if the permission is still applied, even when the reward is already applied.
If the permission has been removed, it is re-applied.

  • Methodendetails

    • isApplied

      public boolean isApplied(@NotNull @NotNull Reward reward, @NotNull @NotNull Leveler player, int checkedLevel)
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: RewardCondition
      Returns if the reward has been already applied.
      The default is when the player has.
      Angegeben von:
      isApplied in Schnittstelle RewardCondition
      Parameter:
      reward - the reward calling this method
      player - the player for which the reward is calling this method
      checkedLevel - the level that is checked for
      Gibt zurück:
      true = reward is already applied

    • onApply

      public boolean onApply(@NotNull @NotNull Reward reward, @NotNull @NotNull Leveler player, int level)
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: RewardExecutor
      This method is called when the reward is applied to the player.
      This method should do the things the reward does when it gets applied.
      If the upgrade has successfully been applied, this method has to return true. If it failed, it has to return false. This is important!
      Angegeben von:
      onApply in Schnittstelle RewardExecutor
      Parameter:
      reward - reward
      player - player
      level - the level the reward is applied for
      Gibt zurück:
      success
